aboutus_section.title: About us
aboutus_section.text: We are your Swiss partner for IT solutions. With passion, expertise and the highest data protection standards, we guide our clients into the digital future. Swiss Made. Trust. Innovation. – personal, secure, efficient.

contact_section.title: Contact us
contact_section.name: Your name
contact_section.privacy: By submitting, you agree to the processing of your data according to Swiss data protection laws.
contact_section.successText: Your message has been sent successfully. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact_section.errorEmailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
contact_section.errorMessageTooShort: Your message should be at least 10 characters long.
contact_section.errorSubmit: Error sending message. Please try again later.
contact_section.errorNameInvalid: Please enter a valid name (2-100 characters).
contact_section.errorMessageLength: Your message should be between 10 and 5000 characters.
contact_section.errorSpamDetected: Your message was rejected. Please remove any URLs or suspicious content.
contact_section.rateLimitError: Too many submissions. Please wait {minutes} minutes before sending another message.

privacy_section.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_section.intro: This privacy policy informs you about the nature, scope and purpose of the processing of personal data on this website.
privacy_section.data_collection_text: We collect and process personal data only to the extent necessary and exclusively for the specified purposes.
privacy_section.your_rights_text: You have the right to information, correction, deletion and restriction of the processing of your personal data.
privacy_section.contact_text: If you have any questions about data protection, please contact us at info@kelepar.com

it_consulting.title: IT Consulting
it_consulting.desc: Strategic consulting and roadmap development for your IT transformation and digitalization.

software_development.title: Software Development
software_development.desc: Custom software solutions, web apps and mobile applications using the latest standards.

devops.title: DevOps & Cloud
devops.desc: Automation, CI/CD pipelines and cloud infrastructure for efficient software development.

ai_solutions.title: AI Solutions
ai_solutions.desc: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning for process optimization and intelligent automation.

freelancing.title: Freelancing
freelancing.desc: Flexible IT services for projects of all sizes – from consulting to implementation.

data_protection.title: Data Protection
data_protection.desc: Your data stays secure – storage and processing exclusively in Switzerland.

lukas.desc: Entrepreneur, analyst and investor with a passion for IT consulting and digitalization. Brings business and technology together.

lars.desc: Software engineer with focus on innovative solutions and secure IT. Expert in DevOps and cloud architectures.

luca.desc: Business-IT expert and creative developer. Builds user-centered web experiences with an eye for data protection.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.text: Kelepar GmbH is responsible for the content of this website. Despite careful content control, we assume no liability for the content of external links. The operators of the linked pages are solely responsible for their content.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: The information on this website is carefully maintained. However, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness and timeliness of the information provided. Liability for damages arising from the use of the provided information is excluded.

copyright.title: Copyright
copyright.text: All content on this website is protected by copyright. Reproduction, distribution or public accessibility of the content is not permitted without the express consent of Kelepar GmbH.

references.title: Partner References
references.text: The company logos displayed in the partner showcase on our website represent organizations with which our team members have had professional experience. These references reflect individual work history and expertise, not necessarily direct business relationships under the Kelepar GmbH entity.

scope.title: Scope
scope.text: These General Terms and Conditions apply to all business relationships between Kelepar GmbH and its customers in the respective valid version.

services.title: Service Offer
services.text: Kelepar GmbH offers the following services:
services.item1: IT consulting and strategic consulting for companies

contract.title: Contract Formation
contract.text: Contracts are concluded by offer and acceptance. Offers from Kelepar GmbH are subject to change and valid for 30 days from the date of issue.

pricing.title: Pricing and Payment Terms
pricing.text: All prices are in Swiss Francs (CHF) plus statutory VAT. Prices are agreed individually and are specified in the respective offer.

payment.title: Payment
payment.text: Invoices are due for payment within 30 days of invoicing without deduction. In the event of late payment, we reserve the right to charge default interest of 5% p.a.

delivery.title: Service Delivery
delivery.text: Service delivery takes place according to the agreed deadlines. In the event of delays, customers are informed immediately. Kelepar GmbH strives for timely fulfillment.

liability.title: Liability
liability.text: The liability of Kelepar GmbH is limited to gross negligence and intent. Liability for indirect damages is excluded. Total liability is limited to the order value.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.text: The processing of personal data is carried out in accordance with Swiss data protection legislation (DSG) and our privacy policy. All data is processed and stored exclusively in Switzerland.

termination.title: Termination
termination.text: Contracts can be terminated by both parties with 30 days' notice to the end of the month. Immediate termination is possible in the event of gross contractual violations.

law.title: Applicable Law
law.text: Swiss law applies exclusively to all legal relationships between Kelepar GmbH and its customers. The place of jurisdiction is Lucerne, Switzerland.

changes.title: Changes to Terms & Conditions
changes.text: Kelepar GmbH reserves the right to change these terms and conditions. Changes will be communicated to customers in good time and are considered accepted if not objected to within 30 days.
